channel.title: Papers on Horacio Moreno Montañes
channel.description: Recent content in Papers on Horacio Moreno Montañes

item.title: Modeling 1D Cold Electrostatic Plasma with a Lagrangian Particle Method
item.description: This paper develops a Lagrangian particle method to simulate plasmas using the Vlasov-Poisson equations.

item.title: Modeling of Stadium Waves
item.description: This paper develops a simple model that recreates the dynamics of stadium waves.

item.title: Discrete Modeling of Dune-Obstacle Interactions and Dynamics
item.description: In this project, we expand upon a discrete desert dune field model by Bishop et. al (2002) and incorporate dune-obstacle interactions.
